name: Media Streaming
description: Content-first immersive dark UI with thumbnails as the primary navigation.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Immersive dark mode. Let the content (thumbnails) shine. Chrome UI should fade into the background.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Pure black background. Red accent for play progress and key actions. White text.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Thumbnail-driven layouts. Subtle rounded corners (4px). Hover effects for focus.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: Ensure focus indicators are visible on dark background.
